data.scheme_name: Gramodyog Vikas Yojana  - Agarbatti Making Project  - Existing
data.benefits: A free 10 day Agarbatti skill upgradation training would be provided to 20 candidates (per batch) by experts in Agarbatti industry.
data.eligibility: Artisans in the age group of 18 years to 55 years  having Aadhar Card/ Voter ID with photographs  and Ration Cards, etc.
data.conditions:
1. Persons who have availed benefits from other Govt. 
  2. Schemes for the same/similar purpose will not be eligible; the beneficiary shall give declaration to this effect.
data.beneficiaries: Artisans in the age group of 18 years to 55 years  having Aadhar Card/ Voter ID with photographs  and Ration Cards, etc.
data.prerequisites:
1. Persons who have availed benefits from other Govt. 
  2. Schemes for the same/similar purpose will not be eligible; the beneficiary shall give declaration to this effect.
data.context: The scheme aims to revive the Agarbatti industry in the country by increasing indigenous production of Agarbatti, thereby reducing imports.
data.objective: To revive Agarbatti industry in the country and to enhance indigenous production of Agarbatti to reduce imports.
data.description:
1. 10 days Agarbatti skill upgradation free training (20 candidates per batch) by experienced/experts in Agarbatti industry 
  2. Assistance with Agarbatti manufacturing machines, raw material for manufacturing Agarbatti etc. 
  3. One person from one family for pedal operated and two persons from one family for Groups activity ( SHGs) for automatic Agarbatti machine 
  4. For SHGs or Groups, all the members will be trained.
data.how_to_apply: The field offices to identify the beneficiaries by conducting the awareness camp/through advertisements.
data.funding_mechanism: Direct benefit of training to be provided to the identified beneficiaries.
data.checklist_info_a:
1. Aadhar Card
2. PAN Card
3. Voter ID
4. Photographs
5. Caste certificate
data.checklist_info_d:
Address:Jt. CEO, KVIC, Mumbai

data.beneficiary: Agarbatti Industry  - Self Help Groups  - All Locations  - All MSMEs
